snippet: A child born in 2013 will cost a middle-income American family an average of $245,340 until he or she becomes an adult, according to a report by the Agriculture Department.
abstract: Agriculture Dept releases report finding child born in 2013 will cost middle-income American family average of $245,340 until he or she becomes an adult.
lead_paragraph: A child born in 2013 will cost a middle-income American family an average of $245,340 until he or she becomes an adult, according to a report by the Agriculture Department.

headline.main: Cost of Raising a Child Rising, Agriculture Dept. Says
headline.print_headline: Cost of Raising a Child Rising, Agriculture Dept. Says
